item.description:
The Boston Health Care IT Professionals Group is having it's first meet-up of the fall season on October 11th.

I'm looking to understand if it's better to meet in town or hold the event somewhere in Waltham, Lexington or Burlington area.

I would like to know if members of our group are interested in having a speaker attend to speak for 20 minutes on a topic of interest to the members. I am planning to have food as well but cocktails will be on a cash basis.

I am conducting an informal poll to understand what our members would be interested in and here are the choices:

1. No Speaker - Just Networking
2. Speaker and Networking

Please send me your ideas on what you would like the speaker to talk about if you're interested in having a speaker. Also, let me know the venue of choice that could accommodate our group - we're almost a hundred people and growing.
item.name: RSVP
